name: Andrew
title: Will insulin make my patient gain weight?
content: All my patients width diabetes should see an opthalmologist yearly for a dialated eye examination begining at diagnosis inpeople with type 2 diabetes, and after 5 year in people with typ 1 diabetes after puberty. Patients with know eye disease, symptoms of blurred vision in one eye, or blind spots may need to see their ophthalmonologist more frequently

comments.name: Patricia
comments.content: Numbers of tingling in your feet should be reported to your doctor at your regular visits.

comments.name: David
comments.content: You should check your feet daily for redness, caluses, crack or skin breakdown

comments.name: Josph's
comments.content: When your blood sugar is low, your body gives out sign that you need food, Different people have different symptoms. You will learn to know yours symptoms
